rows.label: qst700102_msg0001
rows.name:
Huh? Yeah, I'm Joey.
What's it to you?

rows.label: qst700102_msg0002
rows.name:
What? Teeco sent you? Gah, so nosy!
I told her already, everything's OK!

rows.label: qst700102_msg0003
rows.name:
...Oh, fine, you really wanna know?
Three of my Armus have run away.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0004
rows.name:
It's my own dumb fault. I thought I'd
see if Armus have a homing instinct...
Spoiler warning: they don't.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0005
rows.name:
Not a single one of them got back.
What a waste of time...

rows.label: qst700102_msg0006
rows.name:
Um... So... If you see any Armus
running around out there, could you
maybe bring them back here, please?

rows.label: qst700102_msg0007
rows.name:
I think you could probably find them
easy enough by following their tracks.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0008
rows.name:
The names of the three lost Armus are
Yomma, Ajji, and Washish.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0009
rows.name:
They should come when you call 'em.
And don't try to, like, fight them or
tip them over, OK? Cheers and all!

rows.label: qst700102_msg0101
rows.name:
If you see the Armus running around
outside, could you bring them here?

rows.label: qst700102_msg0102
rows.name:
Check the town entrance, there might
be some tracks still. If you can follow
them, they'll show you where to go.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0103
rows.name:
The names of the three lost Armus are
Yomma, Ajji, and Washish, remember?

rows.label: qst700102_msg0104
rows.name:
They should come when you call 'em.
And don't try to, like, fight them or
tip them over, OK? Cheers and all!

rows.label: qst700102_msg0201
rows.name:
*sigh*... Man, I tell you...
This barn looks real empty without
all the animals inside it... hint hint.

rows.label: qst700102_msg0202
rows.name:
Please find my missing Armu, OK?
They must be real lonely out there...
